Text: Nordstrom Online Ship Order ConfirmationDear Lindy Donoho Thank you again for placing your order with Nordstromcom Please note the shipment information below to identify which items in your order have shipped You will receive additional ship confirmation emails if not all items in your order show they have shipped Remember if you ordered multiple items some items may be shipped in separate packages with no additional shipping charges Order Number Your order will be billed to Lindy Donoho Ruskin St Houston TX The following items have shipped via Standard Shipping to Lindy Donoho Ruskin St Houston TX USA Order Item Description Price Qty Shipment Status S M Franco Sarto Bolero Shipped Standard Shipping The majority of our packages those under lbs are shipped via the US Postal Service Priority Mail Most packages should arrive on your doorstep in business days after receipt of your order Please note the following special exceptions for both Standard Shipping Delivery Certain shoe orders could require days depending on your location These special shoe orders cannot be shipped to PO Boxes or military addresses APO FPO others Standard Shipping is not available for fine jewelry orders over in total Gift certificates are mailed separately free of charge via standard shipping Two Business Day Delivery Shipped via UPS Order must be placed by pm PST Added cost Two Business Day Delivery is not available for the following Certain shoe orders Fragrance orders Orders shipping to PO Boxes or military addresses APO FPO others Next Business Day Delivery Shipped via UPS Order must be placed by pm PST Added cost Next Business Day Delivery is not available for the following Certain shoe orders Fragrance orders Orders shipping to PO Boxes military addresses APO FPO others Alaska or Hawaii Most fine jewelry orders will be shipped with this method and require a signature upon receipt To view the status of this order go to youraccountorderhistoryasp To see general shipping information go to contentpubhelpfaqshippingmethodsasp To Return an item Place your return items in the labeled envelope included with your order Leave it by your mailbox for your postal carrier Unfortunately we cannot refund your original shipping charges The returned merchandise will be credited to your credit card We will deduct from your order refund for return postage But dont forget you can always return or exchange any item at your nearest Nordstrom store at no charge To Exchange an item Exchanges are free If you need to exchange an item please call us at or email us at If an item is not available we will do our best to locate it for you Thank you for shopping at Nordstromcom Nordstromcom Customer Service
